programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib
programme.desc: Fired from Baby Corp and trying to build their own business, Boss Baby and Tina waste all their startup funds immediately, requiring a loan from Banker Baby Benny. programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib
programme.desc: Unable to land baby clients, Boss and Tina take in a naughty little puppy as a side hustle, trying to earn a little extra scrap. programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib
programme.desc: Lured into an empty hotel where a baby has supposedly gone missing, the team is trapped by Crispin Biscuits, a chaotic British schoolboy baby who’s been hired to wreck Boss and Tina’s lives. Crispin puts the new company’s loyalty to a test in a series of fiendish puzzling mind games, all with the threat of constant balloon popping (horrible for baby ears!)

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants
programme.desc: In hopes of raising their grades so they can go to Lake Summer Camp, George and Harold must teach Ratrick, their assigned rat, a simple task. But Ratrick runs away into the sewers where he is doused with toxic waste and transformed into Poopacabra! It's now up to the boys and Captain Underpants to stop the beast before it takes over Piqua with its stench, and more importantly, ruins the boys' chances to go to Lake Summer Camp.

programme.title: The Croods Family Tree
programme.desc: Bored of the viewing options on window, Thunk realizes what he’s been missing – real life drama! But when Thunk starts creating drama around the farm, the others set out to teach him a lesson.

programme.title: The Croods Family Tree
programme.desc: Sandy is finally old enough to join Grug and Eep for the annual Daddy Daughter Day and Grug couldn’t be more excited. But when Sandy struggles to fit in with Grug and Eep’s traditions, Grug has second thoughts. It isn’t until Sandy goes missing that Grug realizes it’s time to start a new tradition.

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City
programme.desc: Yi and the crew are overrun with pings from humans who are frustrated by creatures they now live alongside. Just when they think they’ve solved one issue, another springs up – and then that original one pops up again too! Meanwhile, we see an ominous pedestal of light progressively become more cracked with each fraught human-creature relationship. At her wits’ end, Yi accidentally hurts Peng, Jin, and Everest with her magic. She then notices Everest fading into nothing…

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City
programme.desc: In the wake of the previous episode, the magical creatures have all vanished and the world at large has gone gray. Desperate to fix things, the crew travels to the Magical Realm to confront the omniscient Great Watcher, who was a tempting offer for Yi. The kids manage to retrieve creatures, but being back in the human world is sapping them of their magical energy. Feeling responsible, Yi embarks on a dangerous mission to save everyone – but it’s the community of creatures and humans alike that instead come to Yi’s rescue. Together, they realize that their connections to one another are the most powerful magic of all.

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City
programme.desc: After the reveal of magical creatures’ existence and Yi’s magic ability in at the end of Season 1, the city’s citizens are unsure how to feel about this new revelation. A popular vlogger, Bryan Wu, sets out to capture viral-worthy footage of creatures and magic, under the guise of helping Yi and her friends get out their “creature awareness” message. Yi and the crew must step in when Bryan puts himself and creatures alike in peril in his pursuit of clickbait.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight
programme.desc: Po and Blade rush to warn the Emperor about the weasels, but he has Po arrested and Colin captures Blade, revealing that she was never a knight. Thrown in a cell, Po reunites with Rukhmini and Mr. Ping, and he copes with the truth about Blade as they break out. Po fights Klaus and Veruca but is outmatched. Blade defeats Colin and hurries to help Po but is too late.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight
programme.desc: Blade tells Po the truth about Alfie. The group chases after Klaus and Veruca in an epic snowy mountain chase, culminating in Po saving Blade’s life as the weasels take off with the gauntlet and the whip. Rukhmini reveals that she actually has the real whip in her staff, and she knows where to go to get the next one: India.

Someone has taken their sticky anchor and without it they've no way of stopping the ship! Noddy needs to investigate before there's an accident! He follows all the clues which leads him to the Knights. They'd been so impressed by the acrobatics of the Ninjas that they'd borrowed the sticky anchor to help them do acrobatics too! Noddy retrieves the anchor and the Knights apologise for causing such chaos. The Pirates didn't mind though – they LOVE racing about. Thanks to Noddy, the case is closed!

programme.title: Postman Pat: Special Delivery Service
programme.desc: Pat has a very special delivery today! Micawber's claws need clipping and Pat needs to deliver not only the claw clippers but Amy the vet too! On the way to the lighthouse though they encounter all sorts of animals needing help today – from a poorly Bonnie with a cold to a fretful Pumpkin who doesn't want to take his horse pills! Meanwhile, poor Micawber's claws are so long and he's so upset by getting them tangled up in things like Chris's scarf and the lighthouse tablecloth that he flies out of the window, carrying the tangled lighthouse keys in his claws! Chris tries to get them back and finds himself locked out of the lighthouse altogether! Luckily, Pat and Amy arrive in the SDS helicopter. Pat lowers Amy down to Micawber who is perched on top of the lighthouse and she's soon able to clip his claws and retrieve the keys. Phew! Well done Amy and well done Pat!

programme.desc: In order to spice up their field trip to Romeinday (an ancient Rome reenactment park), George and Harold trick Melvin into turning the bus into a time machine so they can travel to actual ancient Rome and be gladiators. After offending Caesar with their comic, the emperor is accidentally turned into Cruelius Sneezer and pursues the school group with all his might.

programme.title: Go Dog Go!
programme.desc: When Tag finds out that Pawston has a chance to host the Dogcathalon Race, she and Scooch rush around to create a movie to show why their city should host. Unfortunately everything seems to go wrong. Will Tag and Scooch be able to save their movie before time runs out? / When Tag's construction project accidentally damages Frank and Beans’ house, she invites them to stay with her family during repairs. Tag does her best to keep Frank and Beans busy so they don’t get in the Barkers’ way.

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal
programme.desc: Scallop is afraid of her first “tuskist” appointment. Kelp helps her get through it with a song. / Fog rolls in, threatening Kelp’s first Three Moon Festival in Unicorn Land. Kelp and his friends use a combination of unicorn spark and the Kelp Way to create a new festival.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib
programme.desc: Our team’s startup company and their rivals at Baby Corp get in a “Space Race”, competing to see who can make the cutest kiddie-pretend “moon landing” for a baby – a spectacle sure to bring in a bounty of Baby Love. With both companies pouring their resources into a simulated space take off, tempers and sabotage are running hot, and the scrappy little startup is in danger of getting crushed by their big business competitor.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib
programme.desc: Fired from Baby Corp and trying to build their own business, Boss Baby and Tina waste all their startup funds immediately, requiring a loan from Banker Baby Benny. In order to receive their seed money and get their company rolling, they have to rebuild the town’s faith in a baby who made everyone miss a huge sporting even (and they have to do it on a very limited budget)

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib
programme.desc: Unable to land baby clients, Boss and Tina take in a naughty little puppy as a side hustle, trying to earn a little extra scrap. But once they discover the dogs in the neighborhood are stealing for a puppy trainer named Becker, the mission gets much bigger, and our team is forced to earn a little Puppy Love for once.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib
programme.desc: Lured into an empty hotel where a baby has supposedly gone missing, the team is trapped by Crispin Biscuits, a chaotic British schoolboy baby who’s been hired to wreck Boss and Tina’s lives. Crispin puts the new company’s loyalty to a test in a series of fiendish puzzling mind games, all with the threat of constant balloon popping (horrible for baby ears!)

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants
programme.desc: In hopes of raising their grades so they can go to Lake Summer Camp, George and Harold must teach Ratrick, their assigned rat, a simple task. But Ratrick runs away into the sewers where he is doused with toxic waste and transformed into Poopacabra! It's now up to the boys and Captain Underpants to stop the beast before it takes over Piqua with its stench, and more importantly, ruins the boys' chances to go to Lake Summer Camp.

programme.title: The Croods Family Tree
programme.desc: Bored of the viewing options on window, Thunk realizes what he’s been missing – real life drama! But when Thunk starts creating drama around the farm, the others set out to teach him a lesson.

programme.title: The Croods Family Tree
programme.desc: Sandy is finally old enough to join Grug and Eep for the annual Daddy Daughter Day and Grug couldn’t be more excited. But when Sandy struggles to fit in with Grug and Eep’s traditions, Grug has second thoughts. It isn’t until Sandy goes missing that Grug realizes it’s time to start a new tradition.

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City
programme.desc: Yi and the crew are overrun with pings from humans who are frustrated by creatures they now live alongside. Just when they think they’ve solved one issue, another springs up – and then that original one pops up again too! Meanwhile, we see an ominous pedestal of light progressively become more cracked with each fraught human-creature relationship. At her wits’ end, Yi accidentally hurts Peng, Jin, and Everest with her magic. She then notices Everest fading into nothing…

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City
programme.desc: In the wake of the previous episode, the magical creatures have all vanished and the world at large has gone gray. Desperate to fix things, the crew travels to the Magical Realm to confront the omniscient Great Watcher, who was a tempting offer for Yi. The kids manage to retrieve creatures, but being back in the human world is sapping them of their magical energy. Feeling responsible, Yi embarks on a dangerous mission to save everyone – but it’s the community of creatures and humans alike that instead come to Yi’s rescue. Together, they realize that their connections to one another are the most powerful magic of all.

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City
programme.desc: After the reveal of magical creatures’ existence and Yi’s magic ability in at the end of Season 1, the city’s citizens are unsure how to feel about this new revelation. A popular vlogger, Bryan Wu, sets out to capture viral-worthy footage of creatures and magic, under the guise of helping Yi and her friends get out their “creature awareness” message. Yi and the crew must step in when Bryan puts himself and creatures alike in peril in his pursuit of clickbait.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight
programme.desc: Po and Blade rush to warn the Emperor about the weasels, but he has Po arrested and Colin captures Blade, revealing that she was never a knight. Thrown in a cell, Po reunites with Rukhmini and Mr. Ping, and he copes with the truth about Blade as they break out. Po fights Klaus and Veruca but is outmatched. Blade defeats Colin and hurries to help Po but is too late.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight
programme.desc: Blade tells Po the truth about Alfie. The group chases after Klaus and Veruca in an epic snowy mountain chase, culminating in Po saving Blade’s life as the weasels take off with the gauntlet and the whip. Rukhmini reveals that she actually has the real whip in her staff, and she knows where to go to get the next one: India.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight
programme.desc: The team arrives in India where an old friend of Rukhmini can supposedly give them a pendant that will lead to the next Tianshang weapon. But when they arrive, they find that Rukhmini’s hometown has changed a lot in the thirty years she’s been gone, and her old friend Diya might not be willing to help them.

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective
programme.desc: The Ninjas are giving a special display of acrobatics and climbing to Noddy, the Pirates and the Knights. It looks amazing! Noddy goes back to Toy Green to tell Big Ears all about it and narrowly misses being run over by the runaway Pirates Galleon. Someone has taken their sticky anchor and without it they've no way of stopping the ship! Noddy needs to investigate before there's an accident! He follows all the clues which leads him to the Knights. They'd been so impressed by the acrobatics of the Ninjas that they'd borrowed the sticky anchor to help them do acrobatics too! Noddy retrieves the anchor and the Knights apologise for causing such chaos. The Pirates didn't mind though – they LOVE racing about. Thanks to Noddy, the case is closed!

programme.title: Postman Pat: Special Delivery Service
programme.desc: Pat has a very special delivery today! Micawber's claws need clipping and Pat needs to deliver not only the claw clippers but Amy the vet too! On the way to the lighthouse though they encounter all sorts of animals needing help today – from a poorly Bonnie with a cold to a fretful Pumpkin who doesn't want to take his horse pills! Meanwhile, poor Micawber's claws are so long and he's so upset by getting them tangled up in things like Chris's scarf and the lighthouse tablecloth that he flies out of the window, carrying the tangled lighthouse keys in his claws! Chris tries to get them back and finds himself locked out of the lighthouse altogether! Luckily, Pat and Amy arrive in the SDS helicopter. Pat lowers Amy down to Micawber who is perched on top of the lighthouse and she's soon able to clip his claws and retrieve the keys. Phew! Well done Amy and well done Pat!

programme.title: Iron Ball
programme.desc: This sports entertainment show brings the best special forces from Iron Squad to take on a new challenge – dodgeball. The 26 players will enter a fierce competition, until a strongest team armed with powerful athletic endurance and mental strength is formed. Witness how they compete in front of the star athletes and legendary dodgeball coaches!

programme.title: The Fishermen and the Sea S3
programme.desc: The new season of this Korean fishing variety show, hosted by two celebrity hosts who are fishing enthusiasts, sets sail with celebrity guests such as K-Pop idols Lee Know (Straykids), Yuno (Ateez), and Ha Sung Woon (Wanna One). The programme features some beautiful fishing spots around Korea and shares useful fishing tips with the viewers.

programme.title: Totally Outnumbered

programme.title: The Lost Bladesman

Cao Cao attempts to enlist Guan Yu into his forces, but Guan is loyal to his sworn brother Liu Bei, who is also Cao’s enemy. As Guan tries to rescue Liu Bei’s concubine from Cao, he is forced to fight his way through. Can he succeed in the end?

programme.desc: Bilibid Boys are young and daring but lost in a cruel society.

programme.title: Epimaco Velasco Story, NBI
programme.desc: FPJ took on the role of the country's modern day hero, Epimaco Velasco. Presented here were some of the best known among the many celebrated cases he solved and his private life as a devoted family man.

programme.title: Kaputol Ng Isang Awit
programme.desc: An unfinished song became the key, which brought together a family forced apart by the obsessive love of a young woman for a famous singer.

programme.title: Boyong Mañalac, Hoodlum Terminator
programme.desc: After living a life full of vices, women and violence, Boyong Mañalac decided to turn his life around and mend his ways by taking after his father, an upright police officer. Boyong Mañalac personify the ideals of integrity and service to his countrymen.

programme.title: Buhay Mo'y Buhay Ko Rin
programme.desc: They're both members of the police force: he's an undercover assigned to crack a notorious syndicate, and she's a traffic officer tasked to manage the city's clogged streets.

programme.title: Hiram Na Mukha
programme.desc: Famous plastic surgeon Dr. Hugo (Christopher de Leon) worships the ground his fiancee Alicia (Nanette Medved) walks on. That is because he feels Alicia is his creation.

programme.title: Sumigaw Ka Hanggang Gusto Mo
programme.desc: Five murdered students, One terrified survivor, One mysterious killer on the loose.

programme.title: Kapag Iginuhit Ang Hatol Ng Puso
programme.desc: An intriguing drama about criss-crossed relationships. The people who were loving, using and losing each other.

programme.title: Pagbabalik Ni Kumander Lawin
programme.desc: Don Jaime (Robert Tlabis) is still bothered by his brother's death although the killer, Renato Solidum (Dante Varona), is currently languishing in prison. Only Renato's death will satisfy him.

programme.title: Habang Nasasaktan, Lalong Tumatapang

programme.desc: A tired American ex-boxer returns to his native hamlet in Ireland to win the hand of a spirited young woman. programme.title: Whisper of Silent Body
programme.desc: Renowned as the "corpse whisperer," forensic pathologist Qin Ming uncovers vital clues from the corpses. During a homicide investigation, he unravels a murder case sixteen years ago in the snowy mountain with his assistant and a detective. Together, they unveil the secrets of the mysterious homicide.

programme.title: Bahay Na Pula
programme.desc: Jane and her husband Marco go to the ancestral house that Jane inherited from her grandmother. As they move into the house, Jane starts to experience horrifying events and her belly mysteriously grows bigger every day, as if she has gotten pregnant all of a sudden…

programme.title: Hostage
programme.desc: A high school cheerleader, Ashley, is adopted by the killers who murdered her parents. She is horrified to find out the truth during a home robbery years later, and must choose to either escape or be part of this family for good.

programme.title: Dorome Boys version
programme.desc: Drama clubs from an all-boys and all-girls high school hold a joint training camp. A series of horrific and ususual events soon take place at the camp and the students learn that an old mountain legend creature, Dorome, is responsible.

programme.title: Dead in the Water
programme.desc: When aspiring photography vlogger Tara gets dumped by her long term boyfriend, her best friend Amy takes her on a weekend getaway to her family's vacation lake house. It is there that they encounter a mysterious and charming man who forces them to face their demons.

programme.title: Sinister
programme.desc: Jing Wen, a struggling drama student, takes on a modelling job to help cover her tuition costs. As she becomes a model for an enigmatic artist specializing in expressive human body sketches, Jing Wen accidentally uncovers a shocking truth, plunging her into a desperate fight for survival.

programme.title: She is in Danger
programme.desc: After a fight with her boyfriend, Xue leaves home to stay in a remote B&B accommodation, together with a roommate Yi. One night, Xue accidentally discovers that Yi and another friend have killed Yi's ex-boyfriend, and is locked up by the duo so as to cover up the murder. Xue's buddy, Wen, comes seeking for her - can Xue and Wen escape from danger?

programme.title: Model Family
programme.desc: A single-parent family (Yu Xiang and Tong Tong) move into a new neighbourhood where everyone’s life seems perfect. However, while things may look rosy on the outside, dark secrets and horror raid each family from the inside, and nothing really are as they seem.

programme.desc: On 9th June 2017, 26-year-old Chinese scholar Yingying Zhang is last seen getting into a car driven by Brendt Christensen, who had been trying to lure women. Yingying is never seen again.

programme.desc: In Tonopah, Nevada, ghost hunters make contact with spirits in a haunted Clown Motel. A UFO flies above Fort Knox. A cryptid peers into a Louisiana man's backyard night after night.

programme.desc: The animal kingdom is brimming with creatures that have extraordinary powers. To reveal the incredible inventiveness of nature and the importance of protecting it, each episode takes us on a fascinating journey rich in poetry and humour.

programme.title: Le Pacte
programme.desc: The relationship between the trio has become somewhat frosty and Olivier offers Arnaud his protection. Laurence finally decides to talk to her mother.

programme.title: Nos Terres Gourmandes
programme.desc: The Ardeche forest is full of surprises, including mushrooms. But beware, picking them is not so simple! In addition to keeping a keen eye, you need to know all about their peculiarities.

programme.title: Bleu Ocean
programme.desc: Since 2003, a sustainable aquaculture program in French Polynesia has helped popularize the paraha peue, a rare and refined lagoon fish. Once reserved for the luckiest fishermen, it is now available in stores and served in restaurants.

programme.desc: A general knowledge quiz.

programme.desc: Gaby is technical advisor on the film set of a crime series, which leads to a somewhat eventful meeting with her ex-husband Antoine, who she hasn't seen in ten years. When a body is found on a rubbish tip, reality becomes stranger than fiction. Particularly as Antoine knew the victim...

programme.desc: Around a chosen theme, Claire Chazal welcomes two authors: novelists, biographers, essayists or historians, and shares viewers' literary favorites.

programme.title: Wilder
programme.desc: Ten years ago Jesch, seriously injured, has a visit from two police officers, Zimmermann and Koller, and the prosecutor, Mettler. They promise Jesch they'll investigate, he believes them. Present day. Rosa Wilder and Manfred Kägi are in search of Jesch, unaware that it's Mettler who triggered the series of murders.

programme.title: Les 100 Lieux Qu'il Faut Voir
